content.rendered:
Torqit Performance Exhausts maximise power, torque and fuel efficiency for both DPF and pre DPF vehicles.

Ideal for towing and touring, Torqit Performance Exhausts are specifically designed to create a deep note and improve vehicle performance.

The Torqit Performance Exhaust systems have been manufactured to maximise power output and reduce exhaust gas temperatures (EGT). They are one of the thickest mandrel bent systems available in Australia – the thickness combined with 304 grade stainless steel produces a deep note and guarantees extreme strength.

The exceptional quality of all Torqit exhaust systems is highlighted by our laser cut, stainless steel flanges which are welded internally and externally (no slip joints), heavy duty bracketry and high flow diesel specific cat convertors. The design of each individual system focuses on optimising power and torque which helps your vehicle to breathe better and last longer

Time for a Performance Exhaust Upgrade?

Generally, there are two types of people looking for an exhaust upgrade.

You could be wanting to increase the power from your exhaust and receive a deep note. Alternatively, you may be looking to strengthen your touring and towing abilities. With Torqit, you can increase power and torque from your exhaust, while also reducing EGTs. What’s more, the high quality steel ensures extreme strength even in the toughest terrains.

Bolt Together Installation

All Torqit performance exhaust systems are completely ‘Do It Yourself’ bolt together.

This means you won’t need a hoist to complete fitment. Rather, you have the option to fit the exhaust yourself or organise it to be fitted through your local stockist. Installation can take anywhere from 60 minutes to 3 hours. Fitment time depends on the exhaust system, if you have a hoist available and your experience with the appropriate tools.

Experience the Strengths of our Performance Exhausts

From the most durable materials to the simple setup process, explore the many advantages of a Torqit Performance Exhaust.

  • 1    Thick stainless steel (1.7mm-2mm): This produces a deeper note with no cabin drone. It is also extremely tough to crack.
  • 2    304 grade stainless steel: This is the best material to use on an exhaust due to its superior strength. It also lasts longer than 409 stainless steel and will not rust.
  • 3    Full automatic mandrel bent system: Perfect bends every time and easy installation, as the size will always be correct.
  • 4    Titanium coated dump pipes: These assist with heat dispersion. By keeping a system cooler, the titanium will lengthen its lifespan.
  • 5    Double braided stainless steel flex bellow: The double braid is twice as reinforced, meaning gas cannot escape. It allows movement on the vehicle’s chassis, so the exhaust system will not crack.
  • 6    High flow diesel catalytic converter: Our diesel specific converter can withstand the pressures and temperatures of a diesel engine. Many companies use a petrol catalytic converter, which will break down over time.
  • 7    Internal and external welding on all flanges: This increases the strength of welds, making them very difficult to crack.
  • 8    Bolt together system: Customers have the choice to fit the exhaust themselves or pay for fitting through a local stockist. On average, an exhaust will take 2-3 hours to fit.
  • 9    10 year product warranty: The unit automatically comes with a warranty that offers customers peace of mind. It also does not void vehicle/factory warranty.
  • 10  Vehicle suitability: We offer a broad range of turbo back and DPF back systems for most 4WD vehicles.

excerpt.rendered:
Torqit Performance Exhausts

Available for a wide range of vehicles.

Please request a quote for YOUR vehicle.
